text: Ciro Pessoa Mendes Corrêa (June 12, 1957 – May 5, 2020), also known by his Dharma name Tenzin Chöpel, was a Brazilian singer-songwriter, guitarist, and poet. He was known as one of the founding members of the influential rock band Titãs and for his later work with post-punk/gothic rock band Cabine C. He was born in São Paulo, São Paulo. Pessoa, who had cancer, died of COVID-19 in São Paulo on May 5, 2020 at the age of 62.Morre Ciro Pessoa, um dos fundadores dos Titãs ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in São Paulo Category:Brazilian singer-songwriters Category:Brazilian poets Category:Brazilian guitarists Category:Musicians from São Paulo Category:Singers from São Paulo Category:Writers from São Paulo
title: Ciro Pessoa
